desc: mBgModel is a modelling/fitting program. It uses the image-to-image difference parameter table created by mFitExec to interactively determine a set of corrections to apply to each image in order to achieve a 'best' global fit.

arguments.name: fit_file
arguments.desc: Set of image overlap difference fits.

arguments.name: corrtbl
arguments.desc: Output table of corrections for images in input list.

arguments.name: gapdir
arguments.desc: Special case when because of projection there is a gap in projection space between adjacent images on the sky.

arguments.name: useall
arguments.desc: Use all the input differences (by default we exclude very small overlap areas).
